DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess health related quality of life and its predictors among chronic dialysis patients and to assess cognitive function using 3 different tests.
DOC.brief_title: Health Related Quality of Life and Cognitive Function Among Norwegian Dialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: Chronic kidney failure Active dialysis treatment Aged over 18 years Able to read and answer the quality of life questionaire
